item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 16 Jan 2024
item.description:
1. Verifying an Effect-Based Cooperative Concurrency Scheduler in Iris, by Adrian Dapprich
  2. OCaml Software Foundation: January 2024 update
  3. Miou, a simple scheduler for OCaml 5
  4. Grace ðŸ’…, fancy diagnostic library for compilers
  5. Js_of_ocaml 5.5.2
  6. First release of oma
  7. Ocamlearlybird just got ability to inspect opaque/abstract values
  8. Validate - A New Library for Data Validation
  9. dune.3.12.1
  10. Other OCaml News
